title: The Gate Of Good Fortune - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Harem   Martial Arts   Mature   Psychological   Sci-fi   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Betrayal   Body Tempering   Cultivation   Eidetic Memory   Male Protagonist   Pill Concocting   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Survival   Sword Wielder   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unique Weapon User   Unlucky Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Goose Five   鹅是老五
description:
This was a fragmented and disorganized world, this was a place that had been forgotten.

That day, was the most frustrating time for Ning Cheng, when on that day, he was abruptly brought here.

Because this world had Ning Cheng, who would imprint his name in the vast heavens, it would finally shine in the endless universe!>
